movie_title: Can we boost the immune system? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction:
Can ginger shots, turmeric and cold water swimming boost your immune system? 
For audio and transcri

vocabulary.example: I drink green tea to boost my metabolism.

vocabulary.definition: minor illnesses that affect the nose
vocabulary.example: My daughter has a cold and has been suffering from snuffles.
After the repairs, everything in the house was tickety-boo.

vocabulary.definition: to make something weaker or less intense
vocabulary.example: The bad news seemed to dampen his excitement about the project.

vocabulary.definition: having a tendency to be affected by something
vocabulary.example: As a child, he was prone to allergies during the spring season.

vocabulary.definition: involving communication or action between people or things
vocabulary.example: The workshop included interactive exercises to engage the participants.

vocabulary.definition: showing intense and eager enjoyment, interest, or approval
vocabulary.example: She was very enthusiastic about the new project proposal.

vocabulary.definition: favorable or advantageous, resulting in good
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise has many beneficial effects on overall health.
